name: Aero Watcher
short_description: This program, (Created with Autoit), will detect when a fullscreen application has been launched and disable aero effects as long as that application is the active foreground window. The purpose for this program is to allow games to run without aero running as well. Some games do this by default, but they are few and far between. While this is the main goal here, I can see other uses for this program given the right circumstances.
summary: A program that will disable Aero effects when in a fullscreen program.
